venue.address_1: Bound by Tremont, Beacon, Charles, Park and Boylston Streets
venue.name: Boston Common's Parkman Bandstand

item.description:
Support - Defend - Speak Out - Take a Stand!

Gun Owners' Action League - GOAL presents:

Rally on the common for 2A Rights

Wednesday April 3, 2013 Noon - 3 PM

Parkman Bandstand on the Boston Common, Boston MA.

Join us in support of our Second Amendment Right to Keep and Bear Arms!

This event will feature guest speakers and will conclude with a march across the Common to the State House.

Please invite YOUR state representative and senator to attend!

More info: https://www.facebook.com/events/617942304888356/

group.name: The Boston Area Libertarian Meetup Group

item.name: GOAL Rally on the Common for 2A Rights!
